alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 9:03PM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...MOUNTAIN SNOW VALLEY RAIN AND SNOW CONTINUE OVERNIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Light ice accumulations overnight with snow changing to rain at times. * WHERE...Entiat, Sherman Pass, Cashmere, Inchelium, Badger Mountain Road, Ritzville, Nespelem, Chesaw Road, Coulee City, Number 1 Canyon, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Wenatchee, Grand Coulee, Harrington, Chelan, Brewster, Okanogan, Omak, Wauconda, Creston, Tonasket, Wilbur, Bridgeport, Boulder Creek Road, Mansfield, Disautel Pass, Waterville, Odessa, Pangborn Airport, Number 2 Canyon, Oroville, and Republic. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
